statements: SELECT * FROM adverse_events WHERE patient_id = '1fa2920c-1bc3-4d37-a645-9b68dbcc6d4f';
SELECT event_date, event_description FROM adverse_events;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) FROM adverse_events GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT event_id, event_date, drug_id FROM adverse_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_description FROM adverse_events WHERE drug_id = '596eb2f9-8c14-4b52-a2cc-0cc4b2688913' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM adverse_events WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT event_description, event_date FROM adverse_events WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM adverse_events WHERE drug_id = '78901234-4567-1234-1234-567890abcdef' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(event_id) AS num_events FROM adverse_events GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(event_id) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM adverse_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%headache%';
SELECT * FROM adverse_events;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_description FROM adverse_events WHERE event_severity='High';
SELECT event_description, event_severity FROM adverse_events ORDER BY event_severity DESC;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, safety_rating FROM drug_safety_info WHERE safety_rating > 3;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, last_updated FROM drug_safety_info ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_description, event_severity FROM adverse_events WHERE event_severity = 'High';
SELECT * FROM adverse_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, safety_rating FROM drug_safety_info WHERE safety_rating > 3 ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM adverse_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, safety_rating, last_updated FROM drug_safety_info ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM adverse_events;
SELECT event_description, event_date FROM adverse_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM drug_safety_information WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM adverse_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT report_id, event_id, drug_id FROM regulatory_reporting ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM adverse_events
SELECT event_id, event_description, event_date FROM adverse_events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM drug_safety_information WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer'
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM drug_safety_information WHERE drug_name LIKE '%aspirin%'
SELECT ae.event_id, ae.event_description, ds.manufacturer FROM adverse_events ae JOIN drug_safety_information ds ON ae.event_id = ds.drug_id ORDER BY ae.event_id ASC
SELECT * FROM adverse_events;
SELECT event_date, event_description FROM adverse_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT drug_name, side_effect FROM drug_safety_information ORDER BY safety_date DESC;
SELECT report_description, regulatory_agency FROM regulatory_reports WHERE regulatory_agency = 'FDA';
SELECT classification FROM drug_classification WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT * FROM adverse_events WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT event_id, event_date FROM adverse_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name, side_effect FROM drug_safety_information WHERE safety_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT report_id, report_description FROM regulatory_reports WHERE regulatory_agency = 'FDA' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT event_description FROM adverse_events UNION SELECT classification FROM drug_classification WHERE classification = 'High Risk';
SELECT * FROM adverse_events;
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM adverse_events WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_data;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, approval_date FROM drug_safety_info WHERE drug_id = 3;
SELECT event_id, reporting_agency, report_description FROM regulatory_reporting ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT adr.event_id, adi.drug_name, rs.report_date FROM adverse_events adr JOIN drug_safety_info adi ON adr.drug_id = adi.drug_id JOIN regulatory_reporting rs ON adr.event_id = rs.event_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, address FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'M';
SELECT adi.drug_name, adi.manufacturer, dap.approval_status FROM drug_safety_info adi LEFT JOIN drug_approval_status dap ON adi.drug_id = dap.drug_id;

SELECT adr.event_date, rs.reporting_agency, pd.patient_name FROM adverse_events adr JOIN regulatory_reporting rs ON adr.event_id = rs.event_id JOIN patient_data pd ON adr.patient_id = pd.patient_id WHERE adr.event_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT adi.drug_name, dap.approval_status, rs.report_description FROM drug_safety_info adi JOIN drug_approval_status dap ON adi.drug_id = dap.drug_id JOIN regulatory_reporting rs ON adi.drug_id = rs.event_id;
